Content: Former Minister Athauda Seneviratne and former Deputy Minister W. B. Ekanayake have extended their support to Presidential candidate of the United National Front, Minister Sajith Premadasa. Athauda Seneviratne and W. B. Ekanayake declared their stance addressing a press briefing held at the Minister Mangala Samaraweeraâ€™s residence. Athauda Seneviratne used to be a Parliamentarian representing the Kegalle district and held a number of Ministerial portfolios. W. B. Ekanayake was an Anuradhapura district Parliamentarian. He happened to be an organizer of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party as well. Both politicians pledged to be committed for the victory of Minister Sajith Premadasa.
